- 7
Lecture structure
• All lectures, except for the introductory one, will follow this 
structure:
– Presentation (90 minutes)
– Discussion about work done during the week (e.g., papers that have 
been read, assignment that has been carried out) (25 minutes)
– Description of work to be done for the following week (5 minutes)
speaker: SYSTEM
